post.author: 이홍식
post.content:
I have 3.5 VAJ and my pc is equiped with 128 RAM. The "매개변수" is parameter in english, so the error can be tranlated into "too many parameters".
If upgrading my pc and OS is the only or preferred solution for this problem, I might have to put it aside and deal with it at a later time and stick with Java IDE I currently have.
Basically I want to have an IDE that does not crush on me whenever I debug an applet. I currently have JBuilder 3.0 University version and VCafe Expert edition 4.0. None of them seems to work well when it comes to an applet. Do I need to set certain properties to prevent them from crushing?
Brian
이성기 wrote: > > What is your VAJ version? and what size RAM do u have? This is not best idea but I upgraded my PC to 196 RAM and Win2000. I think there is some configuration issue to resolve your problem. I'd like to see English error message. Then we can search the fix on net. for example, www.deja.com > > VAJ takes lots of memory basically.
post.title: RE: VAJ takes lots of memory basically.
